title: Sphingolipids as indicators of exposure to long-term air pollution: a targeted metabolomics approach.
abstract: Metabolomic changes related to air pollution have been previously reported, including sphingolipid metabolism; however, evidence from long-term exposures assessed with long-term exposure using targeted metabolomics remains limited. We profiled plasma sphingolipids and amino acids in 188 individuals from the chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) in Dusty Areas cohort.
